attributes.action: Ban the noises in fireworks to stop the suffering in animals
attributes.background: Animals are suffering please ban the bangs in fireworks

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223

Petitions also cannot be published unless you provide a full name.
